Class CoauthorPhysicsDataset: dataset for node classification on coauthor physics graph. Handles loading, preprocessing, providing graph with features and labels, number of classes attribute. Parameters for raw_dir, force_reload, verbose, transform. Business intent: provide ready-to-use graph dataset for machine learning research, especially GNN benchmarking. Keywords: graph dataset, node classification, coauthor network, physics, DGL, features, labels, classes, download, preprocessing.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim. Provide summary of class responsibilities.

Summary: The class encapsulates the Coauthor Physics graph dataset, handling download, caching, optional reloading, and optional transformation, exposing the graph with node features and labels, and providing the number of classes.

Business intent: Enable researchers and developers to quickly load and use a standardized physics co-authorship network for training and evaluating graph neural network models on node classification tasks.

Keywords list: ["graph dataset", "node classification", "coauthor network", "physics", "DGL", "machine learning", "features", "labels", "benchmark", "download", "preprocessing"]
